comparator.description: The operator to use in a condition. Valid combination of values are available in the [AWS Documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/macie/latest/APIReference/jobs.html#jobs-model-jobcomparator)

key.description: The object property to use in the condition. Valid combination of values are available in the [AWS Documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/macie/latest/APIReference/jobs.html#jobs-model-simplecriterionkeyforjob)

values.description: An array that lists the values to use in the condition. Valid combination of values are available in the [AWS Documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/macie/latest/APIReference/jobs.html#jobs-model-simplecriterionforjob)
